subject: Re: Does Frank Sumption post here often?
author: Misty
full_text:
Frank created this group and now and then he likes to take a break from 
the group life. As for emails, he usually answers back unless theres 
too many than it may take a while for his reply.

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dmikolay" <dmikolay@...> wrote:
>
> It appears as though he own the group. I sent him an e-mail; does he
> log on often?
>
